description:
Himawari is spending time helping Chinatsu with her Valentine day gift, but Sakurako feels like a pain when Himawari is not around checking her homework.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chocolate and Tears and Girls and Girls and Isobe Fries
Choko to Namida to Onna to Onna to Isobeage
チョコと涙と女と女と磯辺揚げ
